## Plans

### <a name="app1deploy_app1"></a>`app1::deploy_app1`

Simple plan to run a task on a set of nodes
with result check

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `app1::deploy_app1` plan:

* [`version`](#version)
* [`stage`](#stage)
* [`servertype`](#servertype)

##### <a name="version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String`

the version to deploy

##### <a name="stage"></a>`stage`

Data type: `Enum['prod', 'test', 'dev']`

the stage the server run in

##### <a name="servertype"></a>`servertype`

Data type: `Enum['webserver', 'appserver', 'dbserver']`

the desired servertype

### <a name="app1deploy_app1b"></a>`app1::deploy_app1b`

simple plan to deploy an app
with error handling

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `app1::deploy_app1b` plan:

* [`version`](#version)
* [`stage`](#stage)
* [`servertype`](#servertype)

##### <a name="version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String`

the version to deploy

##### <a name="stage"></a>`stage`

Data type: `Enum['prod', 'test', 'dev']`

the stage a server should run in

##### <a name="servertype"></a>`servertype`

Data type: `Enum['webserver', 'appserver', 'dbserver']`

the type of servers to select

### <a name="app1deploy_app2"></a>`app1::deploy_app2`

with complex error handling

The following parameters are available in the `app1::deploy_app2` plan:

* [`version`](#version)
* [`stage`](#stage)
* [`servertype`](#servertype)

##### <a name="version"></a>`version`

##### <a name="stage"></a>`stage`

Data type: `Enum['prod', 'test', 'dev']`

the stage a server must run in

##### <a name="servertype"></a>`servertype`

Data type: `Enum['webserver', 'appserver', 'dbserver']`

the type of servers to select

### <a name="app1_exampledeploy_app_multi_nodes"></a>`app1_example::deploy_app_multi_nodes`

complex plan to deploy an app on several nodes

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `app1_example::deploy_app_multi_nodes` plan:

* [`stage`](#stage)
* [`version`](#version)

##### <a name="stage"></a>`stage`

Data type: `Enum['prod', 'test', 'dev']`

the stage from which to select servers

##### <a name="version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String[1]`

the version to deploy

### <a name="app1_exampledeploy_app_single_instance"></a>`app1_example::deploy_app_single_instance`

plan to deploy an app on a single server type

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `app1_example::deploy_app_single_instance` plan:

* [`version`](#version)
* [`servertype`](#servertype)
* [`stage`](#stage)

##### <a name="version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String`

the version to deploy

##### <a name="servertype"></a>`servertype`

Data type: `Enum['webserver', 'appserver', 'dbserver']`

the server type to select

##### <a name="stage"></a>`stage`

Data type: `Enum['prod', 'test', 'dev']`

the stage toselect servers from

### <a name="app1_examplestop_ntpd"></a>`app1_example::stop_ntpd`

Plan to stop ntpd on serveral nodes
first: webserver, then appserver, then dbserver

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `app1_example::stop_ntpd` plan:

* [`stage`](#stage)

##### <a name="stage"></a>`stage`

Data type: `Enum['prod', 'test', 'dev']`

select the stage to run the plan on
